name: Struggle for System
description:
You have been engineered to fight monstrous threats. Do not ask questions. If they are labelled as monsters, there ARE monsters.  Do not hesitate. Do not falter. Humanity is on the line.

FEATURES

- Turn-based combat with buffs, delayed attacks, strategic decisions

- An atypical story with political undertones

- Short game: between 1 to 3 hours of playtime 

LANGUAGES

English - French

STATUS

Feedbacks and Critics are very welcome !

This game can benefit a lot from players input and ideas. 

I plan to make a bigger game in the same universe, with more in-depth combat and RPG elements.

CREDITS

Most assets (99.99%) of the assets used in this game are not mine. (I mainly focused on coding the combat engine on top of RenPy).

Missing Attributions :

This game was originally a personal project, just to blow steam off from regular work. I didn't expect to go this far. I used a lot of art without logging their sources.  This was a mistake : it's now hard to attribute arts to their respective authors. If your art is used in this game but not properly attributed, I am sorry, it's lame. Please contact me and I will :

  • add you and your links to the credits
  • or remove the art from the game if that is your wish.
If you have feedbacks/criticisms, please leave a comment !
